title-group.article-title: A SUBQUADRATIC ALGORITHM FOR COMPUTING THE n-TH BERNOULLI NUMBER

abstract.p: We describe a new algorithm that computes the nth Bernoulli number in n4/3+0(1) bit operations. This improves on previous algorithms that had complexity n2+0(1).
